#summary How-To build an Ubuntu Firewall

= Introduction =

How-To build an Ubuntu Firewall


== Software Needed ==

  # shorewall6
  # dnsmasq
  # squid3
  # noip2
  # ssmtp
  # moblock
  # havp
  # dansguardian
  # sarg
  # clamav-freshclam
  # snort
  # ntp
  # pptpd
  # openvpn
  # logrotate
  # samba
  # upnp

== Update ==

sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get upgrade

sudo reboot now

== Install ==

sudo apt-get install shorewall6 logrotate ntp openssh-server linux-igd

autodns-dhcp dhcp3-server squid3 noip2 bind9 bind9utils ssmtp havp dansguardian sarg clamav-freshclam snort snort-rules-default 

sudo nano /etc/network/interfaces
{{{
# The loopback network interface
auto lo
iface lo inet loopback

# The primary network interface
auto eth0
iface eth0 inet dhcp
}}}
